title: Pacesetting Ladies of GloryPlus
description: I dare to be different, i dare to be a pacesetter, equipped and empowered to become a voice, then you have to be in this meeting, i can assure you that this meeting will be a destiny moulding meeting.God is set to do great things with us, through us and for us. So please, all women , plan to attend
